text: The patient in any proceedings under §§ 24-701 to 24-711 shall not be deemed a criminal and the commitment of any such patient shall not be deemed a conviction.

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Rehabilitation of Users of Narcotics. (Refs & Annos)
